page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN IPSWICH
page.content: Ipswich is not known as a large industrial town,but it is the major manufacturing centre in Suffolk. In the South-East of the town there is a great contrast between old heavy industry and modern light industry. A new industrial estate has been built next to two long established works, i.e. Cranes and Ransoms. The older factories, producing valves and lawnmowers remind people of scenes in Northern industrial towns. Pollution, ugly views and a scruffy environment contrast greatly with the new estate. There, bright colours,wide roads, clever screening by trees and grass banks,do not give the area a typical industrial feel.The firms are non-polluting industries such as high technology factories and tertiary services.
